name: Ludum Park
description:
Apologies this game is unfinished.

This is due to the fact most of the second day was spent fixing my computer and only being able to work on it for a few hours on the third day.

Use the arrow keys to move

Shift to sprint

Z to strafe

X to bite

You have 30 seconds to cause as much destruction as you can.

Bite civilians for 10 points

Free other dinosaurs for 100 by biting the hinges on the doors.
